menu.transitions

Class Transition

  • java.lang.Object
    • menu.transitions.Transition
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirectTransition, SlideTransition

    public abstract class Transition
extends java.lang.Object
    A transition contains 2 Panels - a source and a destination - and allows the root menu Panel to switch from one panel to the other, using one or the other transistion mode.
